alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 2:45AM CDT until April 10 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River at Moline affecting Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. Rock River near Joslin affecting Henry IL, Rock Island and Whiteside Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.7 feet, Water affects Barstow Road between Barstow and Osborn. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested earlier Friday at a stage of 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday morning and continue falling to 10.7 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued late this morning.
